post.body: absolutely!
We do, there should be a lexicon of "banned words and phrases"
chocolate money? That is always my fave...
absolutely, it's right up there with "Whatever!"
yeah, that and "Talk to the hand!" Yeah, people still say that...
cool, I'm going to have to check that out...
aye, indeed!
you can try http://tinyurl.com/a3kk83
I need to go to bed - falling asleep in front of the TV - all that shoveling and talking to idiots on the phone got to me today - g'night
I must go fold the laundry *sigh*
Going home now...ttyl, tweeps...
I could use a nap...d'ya s'pose anyone would notice if I just layed my head down on the desk?
I just bought a mint Aero bar, sometimes...you just need to feel the bubbles melt...aaahhh!
forgot to export my stuff from Pownce.com before they shut. Crap. :/
I just want to go home!
mmm, coworker brought fudge...OMFG!
um, that should have been visibility...GAH! I can't even spell today...
The driving was not terrible (AWD station wagon, FTW) but the drifting snow made the visibity just terrible.
what a long morning, I feel like I worked a whole day already, after shoveling all that snow...
Holy lightning! I got to work, we are super busy! First tweet in over four hours! What a morning! GAH!
